title: Nichols (Thomas)
body: This Englishman, who resided in the Canaries from 1552 to 1561, wrote a brief description of Madeira, which was published in Astley's General Collection of Voyages and Travels in 1745.

Thomas Nichols: Englishman who resided in the Canaries from 1552 to 1561

1552: Thomas Nichols resided in the Canaries
1561: Thomas Nichols resided in the Canaries
1745: Publication of the brief description of Madeira in Astley's General Collection of Voyages and Travels
